name: There's Corn on the Moon
description:
A quaint farming adventure about taking up your Uncle's old farm and bringing it back to its former glory and beyond!
Grow crops, plant seeds, and build up a sizeable enterprise as you reach the final agricultural frontier.

The game takes around half an hour to beat, start to finish, and exclusively uses mouse controls.

We combined the farming simulator and idle game genres in order to create a progression from one to the other.
